topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/545416a363687269770a0000#post_545416a363687269770a0000
[bq="uc9"]Here's a bit of news: scientists have managed to reprogram skin cells into stem cells and use it for brain cells.  A massive leap forward if I do say so myself.[/bq]
That reminds me of that thing I heard on the news about some Disabled guy being able to walk now because they took cells from his nose and put it in his spine or something like that?

But still, Gotta love that science!

How?[/bq]
I think it's cause their base sales are going down cause of competition or something; the ps4 actually accounts for only a small portion of Sony's profits.  The crazy thing is that there's about a 80% chance Sony is going to go bankrupt in two years which is crazy.
